title: Interactive Bike Station Traffic Explorer
description: Built an interactive web app to explore bike traffic patterns at various city stations. Aggregated and visualized hourly bike counts for each station, allowing users to compare traffic trends across locations and times of day. Enabled data-driven insights into urban mobility and station usage.

title: Time Series Forecasting for Stock Prices
description: Implemented ARIMA and LSTM models to forecast stock prices. Compared model performance and achieved a mean absolute error of 2.3% on the validation set.

title: Fraud Detection with Anomaly Detection Techniques
description: Developed an anomaly detection system to identify fraudulent transactions in financial data. Used Isolation Forest and Autoencoders to detect anomalies with high precision.

title: Natural Language Processing for Chatbots
description: Created a chatbot using Rasa and spaCy for customer support. Integrated intent recognition and entity extraction to handle user queries effectively.

title: Predicting Housing Prices with Machine Learning
description: Developed a regression model using Python and Scikit-learn to predict housing prices based on features such as location, size, and amenities. Achieved an RÂ² score of 0.89 on the test set.

title: Sentiment Analysis on Twitter Data
description: Built a natural language processing pipeline to classify tweets as positive, negative, or neutral. Used NLTK and TensorFlow to preprocess text and train a neural network model.

title: Real-Time Object Detection with YOLOv5
description: Implemented a real-time object detection system using YOLOv5. Deployed the model on a webcam feed to detect and classify objects with high accuracy.

title: Customer Segmentation with K-Means Clustering
description: Performed customer segmentation for a retail dataset using K-Means clustering. Visualized clusters with Matplotlib and provided actionable insights for targeted marketing strategies.

title: Image Classification with Convolutional Neural Networks
description: Trained a CNN using TensorFlow to classify images from the CIFAR-10 dataset. Achieved 85% accuracy on the test set and optimized the model using data augmentation techniques.

title: Recommender System for E-Commerce
description: Built a collaborative filtering-based recommender system for an e-commerce platform. Used user-item interaction data to suggest personalized product recommendations.

title: Optimizing Supply Chain with Linear Programming
description: Applied linear programming techniques to optimize supply chain logistics. Minimized transportation costs while meeting demand constraints across multiple warehouses.

title: Predictive Maintenance with IoT Sensor Data
description: Analyzed IoT sensor data to predict equipment failures. Used Random Forest and Gradient Boosting models to reduce downtime and improve operational efficiency.

title: Generative Adversarial Networks for Image Synthesis
description: Trained a GAN to generate realistic images from noise. Experimented with DCGAN and StyleGAN architectures to improve image quality and diversity.
